title: How I got a new pixel 4a for review in india? If Google gifted to me , I will be highly obliged .
content:
Hey Google, 
   I want your new device pixel 4a for review in india. I was never be a part of team pixel! But now your new device, at its price segments it will be the market changing smartphone I have ever seen. Please give me a pixel 4a for review. I repeated it. Please.
